import React from "react"; import { Button, ButtonGroup, Card, CardBody, CardTitle, Col, Container, Row, TabContent, TabPane } from "reactstrap"; class Pricing extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.toggle = this.toggle.bind(this); this.state = { activeTab: "monthly" }; } toggle(tab) { if (this.state.activeTab !== tab) { this.setState({ activeTab: tab }); } } render() { return (

Plans & Pricing

We have a plan for everyone

Whether you're a business or an individual, 14-day trial no credit card required.

Free
$0
Includes:
  • 1 users
  • 5 projects
  • 5 GB storage
Standard
$19 /mo
Includes:
  • 5 users
  • 50 projects
  • 50 GB storage
  • Security policy
  • Weekly backups
Plus
$39 /mo
Includes:
  • Unlimited users
  • Unlimited projects
  • 250 GB storage
  • Priority support
  • Security policy
  • Daily backups
  • Custom CSS
Free
$0
Includes:
  • 1 users
  • 5 projects
  • 5 GB storage
Standard
$199 /mo
Includes:
  • 5 users
  • 50 projects
  • 50 GB storage
  • Security policy
  • Weekly backups
Plus
$399 /mo
Includes:
  • Unlimited users
  • Unlimited projects
  • 250 GB storage
  • Priority support
  • Security policy
  • Daily backups
  • Custom CSS
